sections.Biography:
===[[Season 2]]===
He attends the war council of [[Tywin Lannister]] at [[Harrenhal]]. Also present are Ser [[Amory Lorch]], [[Reginald Lannister]] and two other bannermen.<ref>"[[The Ghost of Harrenhal]]"</ref> He is also present when Tywin reprimands Ser Amory for his illiteracy.<ref>"[[The Old Gods and the New]]"</ref> He is again present when Ser [[Kevan Lannister]] and Tywin discuss leaving Harrenhal.<ref>"[[The Prince of Winterfell]]"</ref>
